description: Efficient and effective communication is critical to the productivity, indeed the very survival of business organizations. Moreover, recent advances in technology have expanded the traditional boundaries of communication networks. As corporate hierarchies give way to lateral, project-oriented teams, the most productive managers will be those able to form cooperative relationships through informal channels of communication. Accordingly, course objectives are to deepen the student's understanding of communication in the workplace and, also, to refine the speaking and writing skills necessary for professional development.
name: COMMUN IN WORKPLACE
